name: This is a 2D game
description:
This is a 2D game

"This is Bob's game, but it's still in development. Would you help him to finish it?"

This game is an experience which is meant to play without knowing anything about it, that's why there is not too much information in this page. Trust me and play it, you won't regret it ;) Credits

This game was made in 7 days for the #CommunityGameJam by Aurise Games (@AuriseGames).

Tips

Use "Alt+Enter" for full screen, and "Alt+F4" to close the game.

Programs used

The programs that I have utilized to make this game are:

  • Unity
  • Slate
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Blender
  • Audacity
